actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mammoth makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 22 (3d10+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. _Hit:_ 19 (3d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one Stomp attack against it as a bonus action.
